description: Analyzer for BR-11 CSAR Annex 14 Composition

Supplier.description: Supplier/company submitting the Annex 14 composition declaration (header/footer).

MaterialName.description: Material/raw material name covered by the Annex 14 submission.

MaterialCode.description: Material identifier/code if printed (supplier or internal).

SubmissionDate.description: Submission or document date indicated on the Annex 14 form.

IngredientList.description: Table/list of ingredients with INCI, function, and % w/w as required by CSAR Annex 14.

INCI.description: INCI name as listed in the Annex 14 ingredient table.

Function.description: Ingredient function (e.g., Antioxidant, Emollient) as stated in the table.

Percent.description: Declared percentage by weight (% w/w). Strip '%' and keep numeric with '.' decimal.

FragranceAllergens.description: Any listed fragrance allergens as per Annex disclosure (if present). Use the allergen names exactly as printed.
